faqArray.question: Why is QuickWriteAI called a “Private AI”?
faqArray.answer: QuickWriteAI helps you think, write, and create with total privacy. QuickWriteAI contains the following multi-layer deletions and an audit for privacy:
points: “End Session – Delete Data” button deletes all session data from memory and cache.
No long-term storage of user text, not even in our own backend/database.
Minimal metadata only (latency and token usage are temporarily recorded), no content.
Proxy backend architecture for all API calls run through a secure proxy, keeping your content protected.

faqArray.question: Is any of my writing content saved or stored anywhere?
faqArray.answer: You can delete your data with the “End Session – Delete Data” button. Your content is automatically deleted from our systems after a 30-day retention period of non-text metadata (session hash, timestamps), which is solely to maintain service integrity, detect abuse, and meet legal requirements. Your data is never used to train AI models, never used for marketing, and never shared with third parties.

faqArray.question: Can I use the app for free before subscribing?
faqArray.answer: You can try QuickWriteAI free for 7 days and see how it helps you improve your ideas, thinking, and writing.

faqArray.question: Will AI replace my job?
faqArray.answer: QuickWriteAI wasn’t built to replace people, it’s built to empower you. As more companies begin replacing non-AI professionals with those who have AI skills, we believe AI tools should enhance your capabilities, not compete with them. QuickWriteAI helps you think, write, and create more effectively, while keeping your data completely your own.
faqArray.conslude: We believe AI should amplify human capability and that privacy is essential.

faqArray.question: Is my writing and information provided private?
faqArray.answer: Yes, all information you provide is private. QuickWriteAI has multi-layer deletions and an audit to ensure privacy.

privacyPolicyArry.intro: QuickWriteAI’s mission is to provide you with an exceptional experience that helps you write smarter, better, and faster. At QuickWriteAI, privacy is a top priority. Here's a summary of our privacy practices:

points.title: Privacy Policy Summary
points.description:
User-Centered: QuickWriteAI can personalize writing styles based on the user’s past Written Content, making it highly tailored to each individual.
Encryption: Written Content is stored securely with encryption.
Trustworthy: Your Written Content belongs to you. We don’t access, share, or sell your content to third parties.
Personally Identifiable Information (PII) Protection: QuickWriteAI does not retain PII in Written Content. Any PII detected in Written Content is automatically deleted to safeguard your privacy.
Data Security: QuickWriteAI follows strict security measures to ensure that sensitive information is not stored or misused.

We believe your QuickWriteAI experience should never compromise your privacy. Some ideas and communications are meant to remain private, and our commitment is to ensure your control over your Written Content. This policy also applies to the QuickWriteAI app and website.

points.title: Definitions
points.description:
“Arbitration Agreement” means the mandatory individual arbitration provision in Section 11(b).
“Authorized User” means Customer’s employees, consultants, contractors, and agents (i) who are authorized by Customer to access and use the Services under the rights granted to Customer pursuant to this Agreement and (ii) for whom access to the Services has been purchased hereunder.
“Class Action/Jury Trial Waiver” means the class action/jury trial waiver provision in Section 11(c).
“Content/Written Content” refers to the text-based inputs, uploaded attachment information, and outputs generated by QuickWriteAI's platform using generative AI and advanced language models. All Written Content is considered the sole property of the user, subject to these terms.
“Services” means the online and/or mobile services, web site, and software provided on or in connection with the service provided by QuickWriteAI.
“User” or “Users” means all visitors, users, and others who access the Services.

points.title: Information We Collect
points.description:
When you set up an account, we collect the following information:
Username
Email address or social media login information
Payment details
We use this information to operate and maintain our services.
For example:
Your email address helps us send updates about your account.
Your email address enables authentication for added security.
Your payment information allows us to process subscription fees securely.

points.title: Privacy Policy Addition: PII Safeguards & Data Retention
points.description:
To safeguard user privacy, QuickWriteAI does not retain, store, or process any PII within Written Content. This includes, but is not limited to:
Full names
Contact details (email addresses, login social media information)
Payment information
Employer details or sensitive professional data

points.title: Data Retention and Deletion
points.description:
User Control: QuickWriteAI includes a feature that allows users to permanently delete their Written Content at the end of a session. When a user clicks the 'End Session – Delete Data' button, all associated content from that session is permanently and irreversibly deleted. QuickWriteAI does not retain session-based Written Content after this deletion action is completed. This ensures user privacy and reinforces our commitment to secure and ephemeral writing experiences.
No Third-Party Sharing: QuickWriteAI does not share Written Content with third parties under any circumstances, except as required by law for security, compliance, or fraud prevention.
Data Retention: QuickWriteAI retains technical and interaction data related to the use of its Services for up to 30 days (the “retention period”). This retention period is solely for purposes such as maintaining service integrity, detecting abuse, and complying with legal obligations. After this period, the retained data is securely deleted from our systems. This process applies to all content not otherwise permanently deleted by the user through available in-app deletion features.

points.title: Storage and Privacy of Your Written Content
points.description:
We only use your Written Content under certain circumstances, which include:
For legitimate purposes, such as preventing harm or as required by law for security, compliance, or fraud prevention.
Your Written Content is not used for AI system/AI model training, fine-tuning, or optimization.
QuickWriteAI does not store or retain your Written Content unless it is explicitly exported by the user. The 'End Session – Delete Data' function gives users full control to remove their data after each session, and any remaining technical or interaction data is automatically deleted after the retention period.

points.title: QuickWriteAI applies the following deletion layers and deletion audit:
points.description:
User Input (Secure Entry)
The user enters Written Content, which is immediately tagged for automatic deletion after the session.
Processing via Backend Proxy
Requests are securely processed through QuickWriteAI’s backend (no client-side key exposure). This proxy architecture prevents API key leakage, hides user identities from the provider, and adds a privacy layer that decouples you from your requests. It’s equivalent to a privacy firewall.
Ephemeral Cache (Short-TTL Memory)
Temporary storage for processing responses; automatically cleared. Do not store user Written Content; if buffering is required for retries, it is kept only in short-TTL memory/cache and purged when the user selects 'End Session – Delete Data.' This is designed to ensure your Written Content does not become a permanent record. Ephemeral session tokens ensure each session has a temporary ID that automatically expires, instantly clearing any remaining cached data when the session ends.
End Session – Delete Data
This is where the user triggers full deletion. All cached Written Content and temporary session data are purged immediately.
Deletion Audit (Audit Layer)
Each delete session is verified by auditing the deletion logs and can be deleted, if any data wasn’t purged.
30-Day Retention & Deletion
Only anonymized metadata (no Written Content) remains for 30 days, then auto-deleted.

points.title: Safety & Security
points.description:
Your contact information is used to:
Verify your identity.
Enhance service safety and security.
Prevent fraud or unauthorized activity.

points.title: Facebook Data Deletion Policy and Instructions
points.description:
If you signed up or logged in to QuickWriteAI using Facebook:
You can request deletion of your data by following one of the options below:
In-App Request (Preferred)
Go to your account settings in the QuickWriteAI app or website.
Click “End Session – Delete Data” to immediately delete all session content and associated information.
This will remove any stored data linked to your Facebook account from our systems.

Direct Request via Email
Send an email to info@quickwriteai.ai with the subject line: “Facebook Data Deletion Request.”
Include your full name, the email address associated with your Facebook account, and a brief note requesting data deletion.
Once verified, all associated data will be permanently deleted from our servers within 7 business days.

Note: QuickWriteAI does not store, share, or train on user content. The only data temporarily held is minimal metadata (such as token usage or latency) necessary for system performance, which is automatically cleared after processing.

If you have any questions about data privacy or deletion, please contact us at info@quickwriteai.ai

points.title: Contacting You
points.description: We may use email to communicate important information about your account, provide security alerts, or share updates.

points.title: Privacy Policy Updates
points.description: We may amend or update this Privacy Policy with or without notice to you. You agree to be bound by the Privacy Policy that is in effect at the time you access and use QuickWriteAI’s website and app.

points.title: How We Notify You:
points.description:
Updating the effective date at the top of this Privacy Policy on our website and app.
Additional notifications, such as statements on our homepage or in-app alerts.

This policy reflects our commitment to transparency, security, and user privacy. If you have questions, please feel free to contact us at info@quickwriteai.ai

termsArray.intro: These Terms of Service (“Terms”) govern your access to and use of QuickWriteAI’s services, including our website, mobile applications, and any other products or services that link to these Terms (collectively, the “Services”). By using the Services, you agree to these Terms. If you do not agree, do not use the Services

points.title: 1. Important Information
points.description:
1.1 Arbitration Agreement and Class Action Waiver
By agreeing to these Terms, you agree to resolve any disputes with QuickWriteAI through binding arbitration on an individual basis. This means you waive any right to have disputes decided by a judge or jury and that you may not bring claims against QuickWriteAI as part of a class action or other representative proceeding. Please read the “”Dispute Resolution” section below for more details.

points.title: 2. Definitions
points.description:
“Arbitration Agreement” means the mandatory individual arbitration provision in Section 11(b).
“Authorized User” means Customer’s employees, consultants, contractors, and agents (i) who are authorized by Customer to access and use the Services under the rights granted to Customer pursuant to this Agreement and (ii) for whom access to the Services has been purchased hereunder.
“Class Action/Jury Trial Waiver” means the class action/jury trial waiver provision in Section 11(c).
“Services” means the online and/or mobile services, web site, and software provided on or in connection with the service provided by QuickWriteAI.
“User” or “Users” means all visitors, users, and others who access the Services.
“Written Content” refers to the text-based outputs generated by QuickWriteAI's platform using generative AI and advanced language models. This includes drafts, documents, or any other written material created through the use of our Services, which are customized and tailored to the user's inputs. All Written Content is considered the sole property of the user, subject to these Terms

points.title: 3. Ownership of Inputs and Written Content
points.description:
3.1 User Ownership
Users retain full ownership of both the inputs through prompts that you provide to the Services (“Inputs”) and the Written Content generated by the Services based on your Inputs. QuickWriteAI does not claim any ownership rights over your Inputs or Written Content.
3.2 Responsibility for Inputs and Written Content
As the owner of your Inputs and Written Content, you are solely responsible for:
Ensuring that your Inputs and Written Content do not violate any applicable laws, regulations, or third-party rights (including intellectual property rights).
Handling any claims, disputes, or issues arising from your Inputs or Written Content.
Ensuring that your Inputs do not violate any copyright, intellectual property, or other applicable laws. 
Disclaimer: QuickWriteAI does not monitor or verify user Inputs for compliance with legal requirements. Users assume all liability for their Inputs and any content generated based on them.
QuickWriteAI is not liable for any disputes or legal issues related to your Inputs or Written Content.
3.3 Session-Based Deletion
Users may choose to permanently delete their session’s Inputs and Written Content using the “End Session & Delete” feature. Once activated, all related content is irreversibly removed from QuickWriteAI’s system. QuickWriteAI also retains certain technical and interaction data generated during use of the Services for up to 30 days (the “retention period”). This retention period is strictly for maintaining operational integrity, preventing misuse, and meeting legal or compliance requirements. After the retention period, such data is automatically and securely deleted from our systems.

points.title: 4. Using QuickWriteAI
points.description:
4.1 Eligibility
You must be at least 13 years old to use QuickWriteAI. If you are under the age of majority in your jurisdiction, you must have your parent’s or legal guardian’s permission to use the Services.
4.2 Prohibited Activities
You agree not to:
Use the Services to create or distribute Written Content that is illegal, harmful, or violates the rights of others.
Attempt to disrupt the operation of the Services or gain unauthorized access to any part of the Services.
Use the Services for any purpose other than their intended use.

points.title: 5. License to Use the Services
points.description:
5.1 Limited License
QuickWriteAI grants you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, and revocable license to access and use the Services for personal or internal business purposes, subject to these Terms.
5.2 Restrictions
You may not:
Copy, modify, distribute, or create derivative works from any part of the Services.
Reverse engineer, decompile, or attempt to extract the source code of the Services.
Use the Services to compete with QuickWriteAI or to create a similar service.
QuickWriteAI reserves all rights not expressly granted under these Terms.

points.title: 6. Intellectual Property Protections
points.description:
QuickWriteAI makes no representations or warranties regarding the originality or non-infringement of Written Content. As a user, you are solely responsible for:
Ensuring your Inputs and Written Content do not violate the intellectual property rights of others.
Handling any claims arising from your Written Content.
QuickWriteAI disclaims all liability for any copyright or intellectual property violations arising from the use of the Services

points.title: 7. Payments, Refunds, and Cancellation
points.description:
7.1 Payments
By purchasing a subscription or other services from QuickWriteAI, you agree to pay all applicable fees in accordance with the terms presented at the time of purchase. All payments are final and non-refundable.
7.2 No Refunds
Payments for QuickWriteAI are non-refundable. If for any reason you’re unhappy with QuickWriteAI, please let us know. Contact us by email: info@quickwriteai.ai.
7.3 Cancellation Policy
Your annual and monthly plans will automatically renew until you cancel them. You can cancel your plan at any time by clicking ‘Cancel subscription’ from the “Account Management” dashboard.

points.title: 8. Dispute Resolution
points.description:
8.1 Binding Arbitration
Any disputes arising under these Terms will be resolved through binding arbitration administered by a recognized arbitration organization. The arbitration will take place in the jurisdiction where QuickWriteAI is headquartered and will be conducted in English.
8.2 Waiver of Class Actions and Individual Lawsuits
You agree to waive any right to participate in a class action, class arbitration, or any other representative action proceeding relating to the Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, or against QuickWriteAI. No arbitration or proceeding shall be combined with another without the prior written consent of all parties involved.

points.title: 9. Limitation of Liability
points.description:
To the fullest extent permitted by law, QuickWriteAI and its affiliates, officers, employees, and licensors will not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from:
Your use of or inability to use the Services;
Unauthorized access to or use of your Written Content or account; and
Any claims related to copyright, intellectual property, or deleted session data that the user chose to erase using the “End Session & Delete” feature.

points.title: 10. Changes to These Terms
points.description: QuickWriteAI reserves the right to update or modify these Terms at any time. If we make significant changes, we will notify you through the Services or by other means. By continuing to use the Services after the changes become effective, you agree to the revised Terms.

points.title: 11. Governing Law
points.description: These Terms are governed by the laws of the jurisdiction where QuickWriteAI is headquartered, without regard to its conflict of laws principles.

points.title: 12. Contact Us
points.description:
If you have questions about these Terms or the Services, please contact us: info@quickwriteai.ai.ai
By using QuickWriteAI, you acknowledge that you have read and agree to these Terms of Service.
